                ExcelWriter writer = null;

			response.setContentType("application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet");
			response.setHeader(HttpHeaders.CACHE_CONTROL, CacheControl.noCache().mustRevalidate().toString());
			response.setHeader(HttpHeaders.CONTENT_DISPOSITION, ContentDisposition.builder("attachment")
					.filename(fileName, StandardCharsets.UTF_8)
					.build().toString());
			response.setHeader(HttpHeaders.PRAGMA, "no-cache");
			response.setHeader(HttpHeaders.EXPIRES, "0");
			
			writer = EasyExcel.write(response.getOutputStream(), Data.class)
					                    .needHead(Boolean.TRUE)
										.excelType(ExcelTypeEnum.XLSX)
					                    .autoCloseStream(Boolean.TRUE).build();
			WriteSheet sheet = EasyExcel.writerSheet(filename)
					                   .registerWriteHandler(new CustomCellWriteHandler())
								.registerWriteHandler(getExcelWriterStrategy()).build();
			List<Data> data= excelService.getData(dto);
			writer.write(data, sheet);

		} catch (Exception e) {
			log.error("export data exception", e);
		} finally {
			if (writer != null) {
				writer.finish();
			}
		}
	}

è§£å†³äº†å—ï¼Ÿæˆ‘è¿˜å¼•ç”¨äº†

Caused by: java.lang.IncompatibleClassChangeError: Found interface org.apache.poi.util.POILogger, but class was expected
	at org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.ZipPackage.buildPartName(ZipPackage.java:366)
	at org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.ZipPackage.getPartsImpl(ZipPackage.java:303)
	at org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.OPCPackage.getParts(OPCPackage.java:756)
	at org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.OPCPackage.open(OPCPackage.java:298)
	at org.apache.poi.openxml4j.opc.OPCPackage.open(OPCPackage.java:201)
	at com.alibaba.excel.analysis.v07.XlsxSaxAnalyser.readOpcPackage(XlsxSaxAnalyser.java:124)
	at com.alibaba.excel.analysis.v07.XlsxSaxAnalyser.<init>(XlsxSaxAnalyser.java:58)
	at com.alibaba.excel.analysis.ExcelAnalyserImpl.choiceExcelExecutor(ExcelAnalyserImpl.java:92)
	at com.alibaba.excel.analysis.ExcelAnalyserImpl.<init>(ExcelAnalyserImpl.java:45)
``

The org.apache.poi.util.POILogger was an abstract class until apache poi 4.0.1. Now in apache poi 4.1.0 it is an interface. You have a mix of apache poi versions running. Exactly version 4.1.0 and an earlier version. Don't do that

    public void demoExcelDowload(HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException {

	List<BookInventoryExcel> list = new ArrayList<>();

		this.bookInventoryMapper = bookInventoryMapper;
	}

	/**

	@Override

		if(bookInventoryExcel.getBookId() == null || bookInventoryExcel.getInventory() == null){
			return;
		}

		}
	}
